question: What is the name of the traditional garden in Kanazawa City, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan?
asked_question_translated: What is the name of the traditional garden in Kanazawa City, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan?
answer: The traditional garden in Kanazawa City, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan, is called Kenrokuen Garden.
answer_translated_eng: The traditional garden in Kanazawa City, Japan, known as one of the three great gardens of Japan, is called Kenrokuen Garden.
